title: Episode 199: Susan Wright
description:
It’s Ash-centric! Let’s kick off the week by telling the story of Susan Wright, AKA the Blue Eyed Butcher. Susan’s crime is absolutely wild, she stabbed her husband 193 times and then claimed self defense. She got two trials, and her third shot at parole worked: Susan Smith was released from prison on the morning of December 30th. Let's hope she adopted the, “New year New me motto.”

DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILYHARVEST.com and enter promo code morbid to get twenty-five dollars off your first box!
